short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install Search Shein by Image & ID Chrome extension and easily find products by images & product ID

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uncover the world of Shein products effortlessly through innovative “Search Shein by Image & ID” Chrome extension. Revolutionize your shopping experience by searching for Shein items using images or specific product ID codes. 

 

How To Use?   

>> Image Search with a Right-Click: After installing the extension right click and select the "Search on Shein" option from the context menu. 

>> Upload Your Images: You can also choose to upload an image from your local files. 

>> Effortless Product ID Search: This Chrome extension lets you search any product with the help of product ID  

 

Features: 

>> Image-Based Search: Swiftly explore Shein's offerings by leveraging a right-click action on images discovered online. 

>> Image Upload Feature: Conveniently import images from your local directory to find akin Shein items. 

>> Time Efficiency: Skip the arduous manual searching process and receive prompt results.  

Elevate your Shein shopping journey with this extension and redefine your online shopping escapades today!
